CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Specialist Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Specialist Hospital is arc {Mental Health Hospital}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Specialist Hospital?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Specialist Hospital is arc {TCM Hospital}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Specialist Hospital} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Mental Health Hospital} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Rehabilitation Center to Mental Health Hospital in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Tertiary General Hospital to Mental Health Hospital in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between TCM Hospital and Tertiary General Hospital in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between TCM Hospital and Tertiary General Hospital is {119}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between TCM Hospital and Specialist Hospital in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between TCM Hospital and Specialist Hospital is {70}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Tertiary General Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow output from Tertiary General Hospital is {370}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Tertiary General Hospital?
SC.A: The total flow input by Tertiary General Hospital is {328}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 348? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {830} from {Specialist Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital}, a flow of {426} from {Mental Health Hospital} to {Specialist Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 76? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {74} from {TCM Hospital} to {Specialist Hospital}, a flow of {70} from {Specialist Hospital} to {TCM Hospital}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 109 and 128? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {119} from {TCM Hospital} to {Tertiary General Hospital}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Tertiary General Hospital to Mental Health Hospital or from Tertiary General Hospital to TCM Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Tertiary General Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Tertiary General Hospital to Mental Health Hospital, from Tertiary General Hospital to TCM Hospital, or from TCM Hospital to Tertiary General Hospital?
NC.A: The flow from {Tertiary General Hospital} to {Mental Health Hospital} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Specialist Hospital}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Mental Health Hospital} and {Specialist Hospital}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc TCM Hospital, Arc Tertiary General Hospital, Arc Mental Health Hospital, Arc Specialist Hospital, Arc Rehabilitation Center}.
